Header: Indian Officers in Sri Lanka Pay Homage to Temple of Tooth
Content: A group of Senior Officers in the 11 Division of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) extended a warm welcome to a delegation of tri-service personnel of the Indian Armed Forces when they arrived in Kandy to pay homage to the sacred Temple of Tooth on Sunday (11). Those Indian Officers are in Sri Lanka to participate in a training workshop, organized by the Defence Services Command and Staff College (DSCSC) at the invitation of Major General Ruwan Kulatunge, Commandant, DSCSC. The delegation was warmly welcomed by the Senior Officers of the 11 Division at the entrance to the temple on the directions of the General Officer Commanding, 11 Division and the Commander Security Forces - Central (SF-Cen).
